course_title: Acute and Chronic Care II: Adult and Geriatric Practicum
class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 2 students only.
course_description: This course is the practicum to Acute and Chronic II: Adult Geriatric Populations and focuses on planning and implementing care for adult populations with alterations in health.
